Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory1.jpg'}
{3: 'The riot in front of you lets out a strange roar, then turns into remains like before.'}
{1: '1', 2: "Lucia's Projection", 3: "It's abnormal for Commandant to not respond. Murol, Xun, we're pulling out.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: '...I remember saying that before, but...', 4: '1'}
{3: "The projections then fill in the blanks in Lucia's memory."}
{1: '1', 2: "Murol's Projection", 3: 'Lucia... Go...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Xun's Projection", 3: "I'm worried... the commandant is also... in danger... A-after all, we only just escaped.", 4: '2'}
{2: "Lucia's Projection", 3: 'How could I leave you here?!', 4: '3'}
{3: 'She goes to Murol and Xun, trying her best to carry one of them first. At that moment, the long-disconnected former commandant finally contacts her.'}
{2: 'Former Commandant', 3: '...Lucia!'}
{3: 'He gasps for air as if he has just been through an arduous battle.'}
{2: "Lucia's Projection", 3: 'Commandant! Murol and Xun are seriously wounded. I need support!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Former Commandant', 3: "We can't! I know it's cruel to say this, but leave them there."}
{2: 'Former Commandant', 3: "I've been ambushed! Get over here and provide backup!"}
{2: "Lucia's Projection", 3: "I can't abandon our comrades!", 4: '3'}
{2: "Murol's Projection", 3: "Don't worry about us... Xun and I can transfer our memories... We'll see you again... in no time.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Lucia's Projection", 3: 'Memory transfer? But that technology is still...', 4: '3'}
{2: "Xun's Projection", 3: "Don't worry... We might lose some memories, but... we'll be fine.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Xun forces a smile under unbearable pain.'}
{2: 'Former Commandant', 3: "LUCIA!!! Get back here ASAP! We don't have much time!"}
{3: "Lucia's projection grits her teeth, showing a sign of reluctance as she leaves her fallen comrades."}
{2: "Xun's Projection", 3: "D-don't look so dismal... We'll see each other... in our new frames.", 4: '2'}
{2: "Lucia's Projection", 3: "Okay... Don't break your promise!", 4: '3'}
{3: 'The two of them on the ground struggle to give her a thumbs up, watching Lucia leave.'}
{2: "Murol's Projection", 3: "If we keep laying here... we'll become Corrupted... won't we?", 4: '1'}
{2: "Xun's Projection", 3: 'Memory transfer takes time... Hold on a little longer.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Panting, their projections fade overr time, finally disappearing where they lie.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory287.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Remember anything?', 3: '50'}
{3: 'Lucia shakes her head. Even though she saw her projection, she still cannot recall any relevant memory data in her M.I.N.D.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But seeing them there confirms what the commandant said about the incident. It really did happen here.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Now that her frame contains data from Alpha, maybe it's time she has her full memories back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Nikola withheld part of it at first out of concerns. He believed doing so would benefit our ongoing fight.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "But that only solves our immediate problem. The longer it's held back, the easier Lucia gets lost in confusion and doubt.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'I believe her bond with the Gray Ravens can keep her from crossing that line.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "I've sent an access key to your terminal. It'll allow you to use the Spear of F.O.S. to access Lucia's Deep M.I.N.D.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "That's where Alpha's memories are locked. You should know what that means.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "It's up to you to decide when to use it.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory287.png'}
{3: 'Now that Lucia has accepted the first half of this memory, maybe you can give her permission now?'}
{3: 'Just as you try to persuade her, you receive an emergency notification on your comms.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Nothing so far.', 3: '76'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "I noticed that you've been in the same location for a while now. I was worried you were in danger.", 4: '1'}
{2: "We're just having a rest.", 3: '78'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Alright, but time is of the essence. The Red Tide is incoming.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Evacuate the premises immediately. Bridget should be nearby, she should be able to give you a ride.', 4: '1'}
{2: "(Now's not the right time)", 3: '82', 4: '(Tell her next time)', 5: '82'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After receiving this information, without further ado, you terminate the call and quickly proceed to the designated entranceâ€”'}
